itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss OBJ giving Tom Brady a shoe made out of goat hair, why Urban Meyer should coach the Texas Longhorns, desperate fantasy football trades this time of year, why the Golden State Warriors now suck, the college football shakeup at the top of the polls, why their are only 3 elite NFL teams, who is going to win UFC 244 between Nate Diaz and Jorge "Street Jesus" Masvidal, as well as predictions for this week's college football and NFL spreads.
